messages.message:
Hey Team, my sandbox's storage is full and I am not able to access my sandbox anymore. I've tried refreshing the base image but no luck, there is some work saved on that sandbox that I need. Is there a way to fix and access the sandbox now? Or maybe can I get a small bump in storage so that I can access and clear the spacea?
Sandbox: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/prakhar-ppy?cw=dev

Getting this error as well after rebuilding workspace:
`refreshRootfs: decode permanent manifest base: unexpected end of JSON input`
